name: Super Mail-Carrier Sibs
description:
This is a Java project me and 2 other students  created this semester for our Software Engineering class.

In this  multiplayer game, you must work together to deliver a package without dropping it too many times. Throw the package back and forth to one another and get it to the mailbox to win!

Game Manual:  https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1SWX4c_tvTszN4Ewv3a_azR1hZOhfRl6V15kjVFmr...

Created by Nathan Ruffatto, Jaden Bathan, and John Smillie
